ComicInfo.Series: The Thrilling Adventure Hour Presents: Sparks Nevada, Marshal On Mars
ComicInfo.Summary: Based on the hit Nerdist podcast! Chased by masked marauders wielding futuristic guns in turn-to-glass mode, Sparks and Croach The Tracker race through the undercity of Mars, an impossible expanse of wonderment that defies human understanding.
ComicInfo.Title: The Sad, Sad Song of Widow Johnson, Part Two
